name: theatrebase-api
description: Graph database-driven API for site of theatrical productions and playtexts.

scripts.unit-test: find test-unit -name '*.test.js' | xargs mocha --require @babel/register --require test-unit/mocha.env.js test-unit
scripts.checks: npm run lint && npm run lintspaces && npm run unit-test
scripts.int-test: find test-int -name '*.test.js' | xargs mocha --require @babel/register --require test-int/mocha.env.js test-int
scripts.start: node built/setup.js && npm run watch & nodemon built/app.js

author: https://github.com/andygout
